5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Samurah said:“I memorized two pauses in the prayer, a pause before reciting and a pause when bowing. ‘Imran bin Husain denied that, so they wrote to Al-Madinah, to Ubayy bin Ka’b, and he said that Samurah was speaking the truth.”

chapter.eng-name: The two pauses of the Imam
